content: this pattern is written in standard american terms and rated advanced beginner the pattern has been tested and every effort has been made to ensure its accuracy i am more than happy to help if you have any questions regarding the pattern please send me a message pattern and images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply made by erin the written pattern is for personal use only please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or images feel free to do what you like with the finished product but please credit me as the designer you may copy and paste the following information to your product pattern designed by simply made by erin www simplymadebyerin com www facebook com/simplymadebyerin www instagram com/simplymadebyerin
